Lana is a research assistant and a PhD candidate at the National
Confidential Inquiry into Suicide and Safety in Mental Health (NCISH) at the
University of Manchester. Currently an R user for over 6 years and a member of
the R user group at the University of Manchester and R Ladies, Lana’s passion is
introducing people to the R world and supporting them as they make the switch to
full-time R users.
